name: Ashari Purnima
description:

Ashari Purnima is celebrated by the members of the Buddhist community to commemorate three significant incidences of Buddhaâ€™s life which took place on this single day.

On this day, restless and dissatisfied with his opulent, prince Siddhartha renounced his kingdom, even his wife and son when he was just 29 years old in quest of eternal truth.

name: Eid al Adha
description: Eid al-Adha is an Islamic festival to commemorate the willingness of Ibrahim (also known as Abraham) to follow Allah's command to sacrifice his son.
